ANNUAL LEADERSHIP CAMPS.

Over the past 20 years, Sikh Youth Australia (SYA) has been a progressive, national organisation enriching the lives of Australian Sikh youth and families by empowering Sikh youth, young adults and parents to understand and enjoy their identity and positively contribute to the social and economic development of Australia.

Over the past 20 years, Sikh Youth Australia (SYA) has been a progressive, national organisation enriching the lives of Australian Sikh youth and families by empowering Sikh youth, young adults and parents to understand and enjoy their identity and positively contribute to the social and economic development of Australia.

REGISTER NOW

OUR MISSION

To empower Sikh youth, young adults and parents to understand and enjoy their identity and positively contribute to the social and economic development of Australia.

LEARN MORE

Learn more about our Vision, Mission & Values!

Donate

As a Non-for-Profit Organisation, we rely on the generous donations to fund our community initiatives!

UPCOMING EVENTS

Sikh Youth Australia hosts a myriad of initiatives and events all year round! These include (but are not limited to). Annual Summer Youth Camps, Future Leaders Programs, Mighty Khalsa Fun Days, Book Launches, Global Kirtan Tours & Health/Professional Initiatives. Please see our upcoming & past events below to see what SYA has been doing!

Sikh Youth Australia was formed in 1996, and has been a progressive, national organization enriching the lives of Australian Sikh youth and their families by empowering them to understand and enjoy their identity & contribute positively to the social and economic development of Australia.
